name: Town Crier Post
description: A hub of local governance or public administration; adventurers may seek permits, records, or appeal to authorities.
atmosphere: The post has an official, communicative atmosphere with the sound of announcements being prepared and the scent of official documents and the rustle of news being gathered. The air carries the weight of public information and the essential nature of civic communication, while the atmosphere crackles with the energy of spreading important news and the responsibility of keeping the community informed.
